meanings.definition: A unit of electromotive force equal to one thousand volts.
meanings.sent1: The lightning struck with a kilovolt of power.
meanings.sent2: The electric fence was charged with a kilovolt of electricity.
meanings.sent3: The tiny robot received a kilovolt boost and started dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a kilovolt of energy.
meanings.sent5: The sudden realization hit him like a kilovolt of lightning.

meanings.sent1: The power plant generated a kilovolt of energy every second.
meanings.sent2: The light bulb required a kilovolt of electricity to shine brightly.
meanings.sent3: The toaster popped up the bread with a kilovolt of heat.
meanings.sent4: The music filled the room with a kilovolt of excitement.
meanings.sent5: The storm outside crackled with a kilovolt of power.
